title: Books go walkabout
brief_description: The State Library Bookmobile. The librarian in charge and the driver bring a wide variety of books to places without a permanent library building: old people’s homes; small country schools and townships; isolated farms. Shows the fittings of the travelling library, the librarian answering queries and bringing batches of books specially requested for particular purposes.
